articles.author: Nida Zafar
articles.title: Telecom news roundup: price hikes and a (possible) strike [Feb. 25-Mar. 3]
articles.description: Bell and Telus customers will soon pay more for roaming services. The companies are implementing price hikes to their U.S. and international roaming plans. Changes will also apply to flanker brands Virgin Plus and Koodo. More details, and a recap of almost ev…
